model.otd.SHIPMENTS_NOT_IN_TRANSIT.name: SHIPMENTS_NOT_IN_TRANSIT

model.otd.VW_LIQUIDS_SHIPMENT.name: VW_LIQUIDS_SHIPMENT

model.otd.VW_SHIPMENTS_LIPS.name: VW_SHIPMENTS_LIPS
model.otd.VW_SHIPMENTS_LIPS.raw_sql:
{{ config(materialized='view' ) }}

with SRC_LIPS as (

    select * from {{ source('SAPG9', 'LIPS') }}

),
SRC_T001W as (

    select * from {{ source('SAPG9', 'T001W') }}

)

SELECT  l.WERKS
        ,l.VGBEL
        ,l.VGPOS
        ,shipmnts.VBELN
        ,shipmnts.MARINE_SHIPMENT
        ,shipmnts.FREIGHT_BOOKING
        ,shipmnts.SHIPMENT
        ,shipmnts.FREIGHT_ORDER
        ,t.NAME1 as transit_name
FROM SRC_LIPS l
    JOIN SRC_T001W t ON t.WERKS = l.WERKS
    JOIN {{ ref('VW_SHIPMENTS') }} shipmnts ON shipmnts.VBELN = l.VBELN
where PSTYV != 'ELN'

model.otd.BU_SOL_LIQ_ID.name: BU_SOL_LIQ_ID
model.otd.BU_SOL_LIQ_ID.raw_sql:
SELECT A.PROFIT_CENTER_CODE,

                   A.BU,

                   A.GBU,

                   B.SOLID_LIQUID_GROUPING

              FROM {{ source('OTD_CURATED', 'VW_OTD_BU_DEF') }} AS A

              INNER JOIN {{ source('OTD_CURATED', 'VW_OTD_BU_SOLLIQ_SPLIT') }} AS B
                ON A.BU = B.BU

model.otd.PLANT_TRANSIT_ID.name: PLANT_TRANSIT_ID
model.otd.PLANT_TRANSIT_ID.raw_sql:
SELECT DISTINCT WERKS,

                          NAME1,

                          IFF(LEFT(NAME1, 1) = 'I', 'Intransit', 'Non-Intransit') AS INTRANSIT_IND

            FROM {{ source('SAPG9', 'T001W') }}

model.otd.SHIPMENT_BASE_SOLIDS.name: SHIPMENT_BASE_SOLIDS
model.otd.SHIPMENT_BASE_SOLIDS.raw_sql:
SELECT A.TKNUM AS SHIPMENT_NUMBER,

                   IFF(A.VSART = '10', '', A.EXT_FREIGHT_ORD) AS FREIGHT_ORDER,

                   IFF(A.VSART = '10', A.EXT_FREIGHT_ORD, '') AS FREIGHT_BOOKING,

                   IFF(CHARINDEX('/', TEXT1) = 0, TEXT1, LEFT(TEXT1, (CHARINDEX('/', TEXT1)-1))) AS CONTAINER_ID,

                   A.EXTI2 AS BOOKING_ID,

                   A.VSART AS SHIPMENT_TYPE,

                   B.VBELN AS DELIVERY_NO,

                   RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY B.VBELN, A.VSART ORDER BY A.TKNUM) AS RANK_SHP

              FROM {{ source('SAPG9', 'VTTK') }} AS A

              INNER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT SHP.TKNUM, SHP.VBELN FROM

                           {{ source('SAPG9', 'VTTP') }} AS SHP

                          WHERE VBELN IN (SELECT DISTINCT DELV_SHIPMENT 
                            FROM ( {{ ref('DELIVERY_FINAL') }} )

                                            WHERE SOLID_LIQUID_GROUPING = 'Solids'

                                              AND DELV_SHIPMENT != '')

                         ) AS B

                ON A.TKNUM = B.TKNUM

model.otd.SHIPMENT_BASE_LIQUIDS.name: SHIPMENT_BASE_LIQUIDS
model.otd.SHIPMENT_BASE_LIQUIDS.raw_sql:
SELECT A.SHNUMBER AS SHIPMENT_NUMBER,

                   A.YCDRG_EXT_FREIGHT_ORD AS FREIGHT_ORDER,

                   A.YCDRG_EXT_FREIGHT_ORD2 AS FREIGHT_BOOKING,

                   '' AS CONTAINER_ID,

                   A.XBLNR AS BOOKING_ID,

                   A.VSART AS SHIPMENT_TYPE,

                   B.DOC_NUMBER AS DELIVERY_NO,

                   RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY B.DOC_NUMBER, A.VSART ORDER BY A.SHNUMBER) AS RANK_SHP

              FROM {{ source('SAPG9', 'OIGS') }} AS A

              INNER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT SHP.SHNUMBER, SHP.DOC_NUMBER FROM

                           {{ source('SAPG9', 'OIGSI') }} AS SHP

                          WHERE DOC_NUMBER IN (SELECT DISTINCT DELV_SHIPMENT FROM ( {{ ref('DELIVERY_FINAL') }} )

                                                    WHERE SOLID_LIQUID_GROUPING = 'Liquids'

                                                      AND DELV_SHIPMENT != '')

                            AND SHP.DOC_TYP = 'J') B

                ON A.SHNUMBER = B.SHNUMBER

model.otd.VW_SHIPMENTS.name: VW_SHIPMENTS

model.otd.SO_BASE.name: SO_BASE
model.otd.SO_BASE.raw_sql:
SELECT SO.VBELN AS SALES_ORDER,

                   SO.POSNR AS SALES_ORDER_ITEM

               FROM {{ source('SAPG9', 'VBAK') }} AS SO

               INNER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT VGEBL, VGPOS FROM ( {{ ref('DELIVERY_BASE') }} )) AS DEL

                 ON SO.VBELN = DEL.VGBEL

                AND SO.POSNR = DEL.VGPOS

model.otd.SHIPMENTS_IN_TRANSIT.name: SHIPMENTS_IN_TRANSIT

model.otd.INTRANSIT_STO_BASE.name: INTRANSIT_STO_BASE
model.otd.INTRANSIT_STO_BASE.raw_sql:
SELECT SO.VBELN AS SALES_ORDER,

                   SO.POSNR AS SALES_ORDER_ITEM,

                   SO.IHREZ_E AS STO

               FROM {{ source('SAPG9', 'VBKD') }} AS SO

               INNER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT VGBEL, VGPOS FROM ( {{ ref('DELIVERY_BASE') }} ) WHERE INTRANSIT_IND = 'Intransit') AS DEL

                 ON SO.VBELN = DEL.VGBEL

                AND SO.POSNR = DEL.VGPOS

               WHERE SO.IHREZ_E != ''

model.otd.SHIPMENT_BASE_FINAL.name: SHIPMENT_BASE_FINAL
model.otd.SHIPMENT_BASE_FINAL.raw_sql:
{{ config(materialized='view' ) }}

SELECT * FROM ( {{ ref('SHIPMENT_BASE_SOLIDS') }} ) WHERE RANK_SHP = 1

                UNION ALL

            SELECT * FROM ( {{ ref('SHIPMENT_BASE_LIQUIDS') }} ) WHERE RANK_SHP = 1

model.otd.INTRANSIT_STO_DELIVERY.name: INTRANSIT_STO_DELIVERY
model.otd.INTRANSIT_STO_DELIVERY.raw_sql:
SELECT DISTINCT A.SALES_ORDER,

                            A.SALES_ORDER_ITEM,

                            A.STO,

                            B.VBELN AS DELIVERY_NO

               FROM {{ source('SAPG9', 'LIPS') }} AS B

               INNER JOIN (  {{ ref('INTRANSIT_STO_BASE') }}  ) AS A

                 ON A.STO = B.VGBEL

model.otd.VW_SALES_STOCKORDER.name: VW_SALES_STOCKORDER
model.otd.VW_SALES_STOCKORDER.raw_sql:
{{ config(materialized='table' ) }}

with
SRC_VBAP as (

    select * from {{ source('SAPG9', 'VBAP') }}

),
SRC_EKPO as (

    select * from {{ source('SAPG9', 'EKPO') }}

)

SELECT
    l.VBELN
    ,v.VBELN as vbap_VBELN
    ,e.EBELN as ekpo_EBELN
    ,l.WERKS
    ,l.MARINE_SHIPMENT
    ,l.FREIGHT_BOOKING
    ,l.SHIPMENT
    ,l.FREIGHT_ORDER
    ,l.transit_name
FROM {{ ref('VW_SHIPMENTS_LIPS') }} l
    LEFT OUTER JOIN SRC_VBAP v ON v.VBELN = l.VGBEL and v.POSNR = l.VGPOS
    LEFT OUTER JOIN SRC_EKPO e ON e.EBELN = l.VGBEL and e.EBELP = l.VGPOS

model.otd.DELIVERY_FINAL.name: DELIVERY_FINAL
model.otd.DELIVERY_FINAL.raw_sql:
{{ config(materialized='table' ) }}

SELECT A.VBELN,

                   A.POSNR,

                   A.ERDAT,

                   A.PSTYV,

                   A.MATNR,

                   A.WERKS,

                   A.VGBEL,

                   A.VGPOS,

                   A.PRCTR,

                   A.LFDAT,

                   A.BU,

                   A.GBU,

                   A.SOLID_LIQUID_GROUPING,

                   A.INTRANSIT_IND,

                   IFF(A.INTRANSIT_IND = 'Intransit', IFNULL(B.STO, ''), '') AS STO_REFERENCE,

                   IFF(A.INTRANSIT_IND = 'Intransit', IFNULL(B.DELIVERY_NO, ''), A.VBELN) AS DELV_SHIPMENT

               FROM ( {{ ref('DELIVERY_BASE') }} ) AS A

               LEFT OUTER JOIN ( {{ ref('INTRANSIT_STO_DELIVERY') }} ) AS B

                  ON A.VGBEL = B.SALES_ORDER

                 AND A.VGPOS = B.SALES_ORDER_ITEM

model.otd.FINAL_OUTPUT.name: FINAL_OUTPUT
model.otd.FINAL_OUTPUT.raw_sql:
{{ config(materialized='table' ) }}

SELECT A.VBELN AS DELIVERY_NO,

                   A.POSNR AS DELIVERY_ITEM,

                   A.VGBEL AS SALES_ORDER,

                   A.VGPOS AS SALES_ORDER_ITEM,

                   A.STO_REFERENCE AS STO_REFERENCE_NO,

                   A.DELV_SHIPMENT AS DELIVERY_REFERENCE_NO,                  

                   A.ERDAT AS CREATED_ON,

                   A.WERKS AS PLANT,

                   A.INTRANSIT_IND,

                   IFNULL(NM.SHIPMENT_NUMBER, '') AS SHIPMENT_NUMBER,

                   IFNULL(M.SHIPMENT_NUMBER, '') AS MARINE_SHIPMENT,

                   IFNULL(NM.FREIGHT_ORDER, '') AS FREIGHT_ORDER,

                   IFNULL(M.FREIGHT_BOOKING, '') AS FREIGHT_BOOKING,

                   A.GBU AS OTD_GBU,

                   A.BU AS OTD_BU,

                   A.SOLID_LIQUID_GROUPING,

                   IFNULL(NM.BOOKING_ID, IFNULL(M.BOOKING_ID, '')) AS BOOKING_ID,

                   IFNULL(NM.CONTAINER_ID,IFNULL(M.CONTAINER_ID, '')) AS CONTAINER_ID,

                   IFNULL(NM.SHIPMENT_TYPE, IFNULL(M.SHIPMENT_TYPE, '')) AS SHIPMENT_TYPE                  

              FROM ( {{ ref('DELIVERY_FINAL') }} ) AS A

              LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM ( {{ ref('SHIPMENT_BASE_FINAL') }} ) WHERE SHIPMENT_TYPE = '10') AS M

                ON A.DELV_SHIPMENT = M.DELIVERY_NO

              LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM ( {{ ref('SHIPMENT_BASE_FINAL') }} ) WHERE SHIPMENT_TYPE != '10') AS NM

                ON A.DELV_SHIPMENT = NM.DELIVERY_NO

model.otd.VW_SOLIDS_SHIPMENT.name: VW_SOLIDS_SHIPMENT

model.otd.DELIVERY_BASE.name: DELIVERY_BASE
model.otd.DELIVERY_BASE.raw_sql:
{{ config(materialized='table' ) }}

SELECT I.VBELN,

                   I.POSNR,

                   I.ERDAT,

                   I.PSTYV,

                   I.MATNR,

                   I.WERKS,

                   I.VGBEL,

                   I.VGPOS,

                   I.PRCTR,

                   H.LFDAT,

                   B.BU,

                   B.GBU,

                   B.SOLID_LIQUID_GROUPING,

                   C.INTRANSIT_IND

               FROM {{ source('SAPG9', 'LIPS') }} AS I

               LEFT JOIN {{ source('SAPG9', 'LIKP') }} AS H

                 ON I.VBELN = H.VBELN

               LEFT OUTER JOIN ( {{ ref('BU_SOL_LIQ_ID') }}) AS B

                 ON I.PRCTR = B.PROFIT_CENTER_CODE

               LEFT OUTER JOIN (  {{ ref('PLANT_TRANSIT_ID') }} ) AS C

                 ON I.WERKS = C.WERKS 

               WHERE I.VGBEL != ''

                 AND I.PSTYV != 'ELN'

                 AND I.ERDAT BETWEEN '2019-01-01' AND '2019-10-01'

model.otd.VW_CUSTOMER_MASTER.name: VW_CUSTOMER_MASTER
model.otd.VW_CUSTOMER_MASTER.raw_sql:
{{ config(materialized='view' ) }}


SELECT DISTINCT
    K1.KUNNR AS KNA1_KUNNR_CustomerNumber
    ,K1.LAND1 AS KNA1_LAND1_CountryKey
    ,C1.LANDX AS T005T_LANDX_CountryDesc
    ,K1.NAME1 AS KNA1_NAME1          
    ,K1.NAME2 AS KNA1_NAME2             
    ,K1.NAME3 AS KNA1_NAME3             -- Name 3
    ,K1.NAME4 AS KNA1_NAME4             -- Name 4
    ,K1.ORT01 AS KNA1_ORT01_City
    ,K1.PSTLZ AS KNA1_PSTLZ_PostalCode
    ,K1.REGIO AS KNA1_REGIO_Region             -- Region (State, Province, County)
    ,K1.SORTL AS KNA1_SORTL_SearchTerm             -- Sort field
    ,K1.STRAS AS KNA1_STRAS_Street             -- House number and street
    ,K1.TELF1 AS KNA1_TELF1_Telephone             -- First telephone number
    ,K1.TELFX AS KNA1_TELFX_Fax             -- Fax Number
    ,K1.LOEVM AS KNA1_LOEVM_DeletionIndicator
    ,CASE WHEN K1.LOEVM = '' then 0 WHEN K1.LOEVM = 'X' then 1 END AS  CustomerMaster_DeletionFlag
    ,K1.XCPDK AS KNA1_XCPDK_OneTimeAccountIndicator         -- OneTimeAccount Indicator
    ,K1.ADRNR AS KNA1_ADRNR_AddressNumber             -- Address
    ,K1.MCOD1 AS KNA1_MCOD1_SearchMatchCode1             -- Search Term Match Code 1
    ,K1.MCOD2 AS KNA1_MCOD2_SearchMatchCode2             -- Search Term Match Code 2
    ,K1.MCOD3 AS KNA1_MCOD3_SearchMatchCode3             -- Search Term Match Code 3
    ,K1.AUFSD AS KNA1_AUFSD_CentralOrderBlock             -- Central order block for customer
    ,K1.BAHNE AS KNA1_BAHNE_ExpressTrainStation             -- Express train station
    ,K1.BAHNS AS KNA1_BAHNS_TrainStation             -- Train station
    ,K1.BEGRU AS KNA1_BEGRU_AuthorizationGroup             -- Authorization Group
    ,K1.BUBKZ AS KNA1_BUBKZ_CheckDigitIntLocationIndicator             -- Check digit for the international location number
    ,K1.ERDAT AS KNA1_ERDAT_CreatedDate             -- Date on which the Record Was Created
    ,K1.ERNAM AS KNA1_ERNAM_CreatedBy             -- Name of Person who Created the Object
    ,K1.EXABL AS KNA1_EXABL_IndicatorUnloadingPointExist             -- Indicator: Unloading points exist
    ,K1.FAKSD AS KNA1_FAKSD_CentralBillingBlock             -- Central billing block for customer
    ,K1.FISKN AS KNA1_FISKN_AccountNumberMasterRec             -- Account number of the master record with the fiscal address
    ,K1.KONZS AS KNA1_KONZS_GroupKey             -- Group key
    ,K1.KTOKD AS KNA1_KTOKD_AccountGroup             -- Customer Account Group
    ,K1.KUKLA AS KNA1_KUKLA_CustClassification             -- Customer classification
    ,K1.LIFNR AS KNA1_LIFNR_AccNoVendorCreditor             -- Account Number of Vendor or Creditor
    ,K1.LIFSD AS KNA1_LIFSD_CentralDeliveryBlock             -- Central delivery block for the customer
    ,K1.LOCCO AS KNA1_LOCCO_CityCoordinates             -- City Coordinates
    ,K1.LOEVM AS KNA1_LOEVM_CentralDeletionFlag             -- Central Deletion Flag for Master Record
    ,K1.ORT02 AS KNA1_ORT02_District             -- District
    ,K1.PFACH AS KNA1_PFACH_POBox             -- PO Box
    ,K1.PSTL2 AS KNA1_PSTL2_PostalCode             -- P.O. Box Postal Code
    ,K1.COUNC AS KNA1_COUNC_CountryCode             -- County Code
    ,K1.SPERR AS KNA1_SPERR_CentralPostingBlock             -- Central posting block
    ,K1.SPRAS AS KNA1_SPRAS_LanguageKey             -- Language Key
    ,E1.SPTXT AS T002T_SPTXT_LanguageDescription
    ,K1.STCD1 AS KNA1_STCD1_TaxNumber1             -- Tax Number 1
    ,K1.STCD2 AS KNA1_STCD2_TaxNumber2             -- Tax Number 2
    ,K1.STCD3 AS KNA1_STCD3_TaxNumber3             -- Tax Number 3
    ,K1.STCD4 AS KNA1_STCD4_TaxNumber4             -- Tax Number 4
    ,K1.TELF2 AS KNA1_TELF2_SecondTelephoneNumber             -- Second telephone number
    ,K1.LZONE AS KNA1_LZONE_TransportationZone             -- Transportation zone to or from which the goods are delivered
    ,K1.VBUND AS KNA1_VBUND_TradingPartnerCompanyID             -- Trading Partner Company ID
    ,K1.STCEG AS KNA1_STCEG_VATRegisterationNumber             -- VAT Registration Number
    ,K1.DEAR2 AS KNA1_DEAR2_SalesPartnerIndicator             -- Sales Partner Indicator
    ,K1.BRAN1 AS KNA1_BRAN1_IndustryCode1             -- Industry Code 1
    ,K1.BRAN5 AS KNA1_BRAN5_IndustryCode5             -- Industry code 5
    ,K1.KATR10 AS KNA1_KATR10_Attribute10           -- Attribute 10
    ,K1.STKZN AS KNA1_STKZN_NaturalPerson             -- Natural Person
    ,K1.TXJCD AS KNA1_TXJCD_TaxJurisdiction             -- Tax Jurisdiction
    ,K1.KTOCD AS KNA1_KTOCD_RefAccGroupOneTimeCust             -- Reference Account Group for One-Time Account (Customer)
    ,K1.PFORT AS KNA1_PFORT_POBoxCity             -- PO Box city
    ,K1.DUEFL AS KNA1_DUEFL_StatusOfDataTransfer             -- Status of Data Transfer into Subsequent Release
    ,K1.KDKG4 AS KNA1_KDKG4_CustomerConditionGroup4             -- Customer condition group 4
    ,K1.FITYP AS KNA1_FITYP_TaxType             -- Tax type
    ,K1.STCDT AS KNA1_STCDT_TaxNumberType             -- Tax Number Type
    ,K1.XICMS AS KNA1_XICMS_ICMSExempt             -- Customer is ICMS-exempt
    ,K1.XXIPI AS KNA1_XXIPI_IPIExempt             -- Customer is IPI-exempt
    ,K1.XSUBT AS KNA1_XSUBT_CustGrpSubstTributaryCalculation             -- Customer group for Substituiçao Tributária calculation
    ,K1.CFOPC AS KNA1_CFOPC_CFOPCategory             -- Customer's CFOP category
    ,K1.TXLW1 AS KNA1_TXLW1_TaxLawICMS             -- Tax law: ICMS
    ,K1.TXLW2 AS KNA1_TXLW2_TaxLawIPI             -- Tax law: IPI
    ,K1.CASSD AS KNA1_CASSD_CentralSalesBlock             -- Central sales block for customer
    ,K1.KNURL AS KNA1_KNURL_UniformResourceLocator             -- Uniform Resource Locator
    ,K1.J_1KFREPRE AS KNA1_J_1KFREPRE_NameOfRepresentative   -- Name of Representative
    ,K1.J_1KFTBUS AS KNA1_J_1KFTBUS_TypeOfBusiness     -- Type of Business
    ,K1.NODEL AS KNA1_NODEL_CentralDeletionBlock             -- Central deletion block for master record
    ,K1.OID_POREQD AS KNA1_OID_POREQD_PurchaseOrderRequired   -- Purchase order required: X = Yes, Blank = No
    ,A1.ADDRNUMBER AS ADRC_ADDRNUMBER_AddressNumber   -- Address Number
    ,A1.DATE_FROM AS ADRC_DATE_FROM_ValidFromDate     -- Valid-from date - in current Release only 00010101 possible
    ,A1.NATION AS ADRC_NATION_VersionIdIntAddress             -- Version ID for International Addresses
    ,A1.DATE_TO AS ADRC_DATE_TO_ValidTo             -- Valid-to date in current Release only 99991231 possible
    ,A1.TITLE AS ADRC_TITLE_FormOfAddressKey                     -- Form-of-Address Key
    ,A1.NAME1 AS ADRC_NAME1                     -- Name adrc1
    ,A1.NAME2 AS ADRC_NAME2                     -- Name adrc2
    ,A1.NAME3 AS ADRC_NAME3                     -- Name adrc3
    ,A1.NAME4 AS ADRC_NAME4                     -- Name adrc4
    ,A1.NAME_TEXT AS ADRC_NAME_TEXT             -- Converted name field (with form of address)
    ,A1.NAME_CO AS ADRC_NAME_CO                 -- c/o name
    ,A1.CITY1 AS ADRC_CITY1                     -- City adrc
    ,A1.CITY2 AS ADRC_CITY2                     -- District adrc
    ,A1.HOME_CITY AS ADRC_HOME_CITY             -- City (different from postal city)
    ,A1.POST_CODE1 AS ADRC_POST_CODE1           -- City postal code
    ,A1.POST_CODE2 AS ADRC_POST_CODE2           -- PO Box Postal Code
    ,A1.POST_CODE3 AS ADRC_POST_CODE3           -- Company Postal Code (for Large Customers)
    ,A1.PO_BOX AS ADRC_PO_BOX                   -- PO Box adrc
    ,A1.PO_BOX_LOC AS ADRC_PO_BOX_LOC           -- PO Box city adrc
    ,A1.PO_BOX_REG AS ADRC_PO_BOX_REG           -- Region for PO Box (Country, State, Province, ...)
    ,A1.TRANSPZONE AS ADRC_TRANSPZONE           -- Transportation zone to or from which the goods are delivered adrc
    ,A1.STREET AS ADRC_STREET                   -- Street
    ,A1.HOUSE_NUM1 AS ADRC_HOUSE_NUM1           -- House Number
    ,A1.HOUSE_NUM2 AS ADRC_HOUSE_NUM2           -- House number supplement
    ,A1.HOUSE_NUM3 AS ADRC_HOUSE_NUM3           -- (Not supported) House Number Range
    ,A1.STR_SUPPL1 AS ADRC_STR_SUPPL1           -- Street 2
    ,A1.STR_SUPPL2 AS ADRC_STR_SUPPL2           -- Street 3
    ,A1.STR_SUPPL3 AS ADRC_STR_SUPPL3           -- Street 4
    ,A1.LOCATION AS ADRC_LOCATION               -- Street 5
    ,A1.BUILDING AS ADRC_BUILDING               -- Building (Number or Code)
    ,A1.FLOOR AS ADRC_FLOOR                     -- Floor in building
    ,A1.ROOMNUMBER AS ADRC_ROOMNUMBER           -- Room or Apartment Number
    ,A1.COUNTRY AS ADRC_COUNTRY                 -- Country Key adrc
    ,A1.LANGU AS ADRC_LANGU                     -- Language Key adrc
    ,A1.REGION AS ADRC_REGION                   -- Region (State, Province, County) adrc
    ,A1.ADDR_GROUP AS ADRC_ADDR_GROUP           -- Address Group (Key) (Business Address Services)
    ,A1.FLAGGROUPS AS ADRC_FLAGGROUPS           -- Flag: There are more address group assignments
    ,A1.PERS_ADDR AS ADRC_PERS_ADDR             -- Flag: This is a personal address
    ,A1.SORT1 AS ADRC_SORT1					  -- Search Term 1
    ,A1.SORT2 AS ADRC_SORT2                     -- Search Term 2
    ,A1.DEFLT_COMM AS ADRC_DEFLT_COMM           -- Communication Method (Key) (Business Address Services)
    ,A1.TEL_NUMBER AS ADRC_TEL_NUMBER           -- First telephone no.: dialling code+number
    ,A1.TEL_EXTENS AS ADRC_TEL_EXTENS           -- First Telephone No.: Extension
    ,A1.FAX_NUMBER AS ADRC_FAX_NUMBER           -- First fax no.: dialling code+number
    ,A1.FAX_EXTENS AS ADRC_FAX_EXTENS           -- First fax no.: extension
    ,A1.FLAGCOMM2 AS ADRC_FLAGCOMM2             -- Flag: Telephone number(s) maintained
    ,A1.FLAGCOMM3 AS ADRC_FLAGCOMM3             -- Flag: Fax number(s) maintained
    ,A1.FLAGCOMM4 AS ADRC_FLAGCOMM4             -- Flag: Teletex number(s) maintained
    ,A1.FLAGCOMM5 AS ADRC_FLAGCOMM5             -- Flag: Telex number(s) maintained
    ,A1.FLAGCOMM6 AS ADRC_FLAGCOMM6             -- Indicator: E-Mail Address(es) Maintained
    ,A1.FLAGCOMM7 AS ADRC_FLAGCOMM7             -- Flag: RML (remote mail) addresse(s) maintained
    ,A1.FLAGCOMM12 AS FLAGCOMM12                -- Flag: URI/FTP address maintained
    ,A1.FLAGCOMM13 AS FLAGCOMM13                  -- Flag: Pager address maintained
    ,A1.MC_NAME1 AS ADRC_MC_NAME1                 -- Name (field NAME1) in upper case for matchcode
    ,A1.MC_CITY1 AS ADRC_MC_CITY1                 -- City name in upper case for search help
    ,A1.MC_STREET AS ADRC_MC_STREET               -- Street name in upper case for search help
    ,A1.EXTENSION1 AS ADRC_EXTENSION1             -- Extension (only for data conversion) (e.g. data line)
    ,A1.EXTENSION2 AS ADRC_EXTENSION2             -- Extension (only for data conversion) (e.g. telebox)
    ,A1.TIME_ZONE AS ADRC_TIME_ZONE               -- Address time zone
    ,A1.TAXJURCODE AS TAXJURCODE                  -- Tax Jurisdiction adrc
    ,A1.LANGU_CREA AS LANGU_CREA                  -- Address record creation original language
    ,A1.ADRC_UUID AS ADRC_ADRC_UUID               -- UUID Used in the Address
    ,A1.UUID_BELATED AS ADRC_UUID_BELATED         -- Indicator: UUID was generated later
    ,A1.ADRC_ERR_STATUS AS ADRC_ADRC_ERR_STATUS   -- Error Status of Address
    ,A1.PO_BOX_LOBBY AS ADRC_PO_BOX_LOBBY         -- PO Box Lobby
    ,T1.TXT30 AS T077X_TXT30                      -- Customer Account Group Description
    ,k1.AUFSD as KNA1_AUFSD
    ,TVAST.VTEXT as TVAST_VTEXT
    ,k1.FAKSD as KNA1_FAKSD
    ,TVFST.VTEXT as TVFST_VTEXT
    ,k1.LIFSD as KNA1_LIFSD
    ,TVLST.VTEXT as TVLST_VTEXT

    FROM {{ source('CHEM_DEVELOPMENT_RAW', 'SAP_G9_KNA1') }} as K1
    LEFT JOIN {{ source('CHEM_DEVELOPMENT_RAW', 'SAP_G9_ADRC') }} as A1 on K1.ADRNR = a1.ADDRNUMBER and A1.NATION = '' and A1.CLIENT = K1.MANDT
    LEFT JOIN {{ source('CHEM_DEVELOPMENT_RAW', 'SAP_G9_T077X') }} as T1 on T1.KTOKD = K1.KTOKD and T1.SPRAS = 'E'
    LEFT JOIN {{ source('CHEM_DEVELOPMENT_RAW', 'SAP_G9_T002T') }} as E1 on E1.SPRAS = 'E' and E1.SPRSL = K1.SPRAS 
    LEFT JOIN {{ source('CHEM_DEVELOPMENT_RAW', 'SAP_G9_T005T') }} as C1 on C1.SPRAS = K1.SPRAS and C1.LAND1 = K1.LAND1
    LEFT JOIN {{ source('CHEM_DEVELOPMENT_RAW', 'SAP_G9_TVFST') }} as TVFST 
    	on TVFST.FAKSP = k1.FAKSD and TVFST.SPRAS = 'E'
    LEFT JOIN {{ source('CHEM_DEVELOPMENT_RAW', 'SAP_G9_TVLST') }} as TVLST 
    	on TVLST.LIFSP = k1.LIFSD and TVLST.SPRAS = 'E'
    LEFT JOIN {{ source('CHEM_DEVELOPMENT_RAW', 'SAP_G9_TVAST') }} as TVAST
    	on TVAST.AUFSP = k1.AUFSD and TVAST.SPRAS = 'E'

model.otd.VW_SALES_VOLUME_REPORT.name: VW_SALES_VOLUME_REPORT
model.otd.VW_SALES_VOLUME_REPORT.raw_sql:
{{ config(materialized='view' ) }}


SELECT
  SAP_VBAK_STG.VBELN as "VBELN_SALESORDERNO"
 ,SAP_VBAK_STG.AUART AS "AUART_SALESORDTYPE"
 ,SAP_VBAK_STG.erdat AS "ERDAT_SalesOrderCreationDate"
 ,DM_SALES_VOLUMELATEST."Parent Account"
 ,DM_SALES_VOLUMELATEST."Parent Account Desc"
 ,DM_SALES_VOLUMELATEST."Super Region Desc"
 ,SAP_VBAK_STG.KUNNR AS "KUNNR_SOLDTO-NO"
 ,DM_SALES_VOLUMELATEST."Customer Desc"
 ,DM_SALES_VOLUMELATEST."Deliverable Product"
 ,DM_SALES_VOLUMELATEST."Deliverable Product Desc"
 ,DM_SALES_VOLUMELATEST."Finished  Product"
 ,DM_SALES_VOLUMELATEST."Industry"
 ,DM_SALES_VOLUMELATEST."Market Segment"
 ,DM_SALES_VOLUMELATEST."Market Segment Desc"
 ,DM_SALES_VOLUMELATEST."End Use"
 ,DM_SALES_VOLUMELATEST."End Use Desc"
 ,SAP_VBAK_STG.VKORG AS "KUNNR_SALESORG"
 ,SAP_VBAK_STG.SPART AS "KUNNR_DIVISION"  
 ,SAP_VBAK_STG.VTWEG AS "KUNNR_DISTCHANNEL"
 ,SAP_VBAP_STG.MATNR AS "MATNR_MATERIALNO"
 ,SAP_VBAP_STG.NETWR AS "NETWR_NETVALUE" 
 ,SAP_VBAP_STG.WAERK AS "WAERK_CURRENCY"
 ,SAP_VBAP_STG.ZMENG AS "ZMENG_QUANTITY"
 ,SAP_VBAP_STG.ZIEME AS "ZIEME_QTY_UOM"
 ,SAP_VBAP_STG.UMZIZ AS "UMZIZ_CONV_NUMERATOR"
 ,SAP_VBAP_STG.UMZIN AS "UMZIN_CONV_DENOMINATOR"
 ,SAP_VBAP_STG.MEINS AS "MEINS_BASE_UOM"
 ,TCURR.UKURS AS "UKURS_EXCHANGE_RATE"
 ,(SAP_VBAP_STG.NETWR * 1/TCURR.UKURS) AS "NETVALUE_USD" 
FROM
  {{ source('CHEM_DEVELOPMENT_RAW', 'SAP_G9_VBAK') }} SAP_VBAK_STG
  INNER JOIN {{ source('CHEM_DEVELOPMENT_RAW', 'SAP_G9_VBAP1') }} SAP_VBAP_STG
    ON (SAP_VBAK_STG.VBELN = SAP_VBAP_STG.VBELN) 
    AND (SAP_VBAK_STG.MANDT = SAP_VBAP_STG.MANDT)
  LEFT OUTER JOIN {{ source('CHEM_DEVELOPMENT_RAW', 'SAPG9_TCURR') }} TCURR
    ON (SAP_VBAP_STG.WAERK = TCURR.FCURR) 
  LEFT JOIN {{ source('CHEM_DEVELOPMENT_RAW', 'DM_SALES_VOLUMELATEST') }} DM_SAlES_VOLUMELATEST
    ON(LTRIM(SAP_VBAK_STG.KUNNR,'0#') = DM_SALES_VOLUMELATEST."Customer")
    AND(LTRIM(SAP_VBAK_STG.VBELN,'0#') = DM_SALES_VOLUMELATEST."Sales Order")
    AND(LTRIM(SAP_VBAP_STG.MATNR,'0#') = DM_SALES_VOLUMELATEST."Deliverable Product")
  
where SAP_VBAK_STG.auart in ('TA','ORB', 'KB', 'KBB', 'ORF')
and sap_vbak_stg.ernam <> 'XXPMBUPLD' 
and sap_vbak_stg.spart not in ('NS', 'IC', 'ID') 
and sap_vbap_stg.pstyv in ('TAN', 'TAB', 'ZTAW', 'TAQ', 'ZTAQ')

model.otd.SALES_REVENUE_CUSTOMERS.name: SALES_REVENUE_CUSTOMERS
model.otd.SALES_REVENUE_CUSTOMERS.raw_sql:
{{ config(materialized='table' ) }}

SELECT
    VR."KUNNR_SOLDTO-NO" as "Customer"
    ,CM."KNA1_LAND1_COUNTRYKEY" as "Country Key"
    ,CM."KNA1_ORT01_CITY" as "City"
    ,CM."KNA1_NAME1" as "Company Name"
    ,LEFT(VR."ERDAT_SalesOrderCreationDate",4) as "Year of sale"
    ,ROUND(SUM(VR."NETVALUE_USD")) as "Total Sales"

FROM {{ ref('VW_SALES_VOLUME_REPORT') }} VR
JOIN {{ ref('VW_CUSTOMER_MASTER') }}  CM
    ON CM."KNA1_KUNNR_CUSTOMERNUMBER" = VR."KUNNR_SOLDTO-NO"
GROUP BY
    VR."KUNNR_SOLDTO-NO"
    ,CM."KNA1_LAND1_COUNTRYKEY"
    ,CM."KNA1_ORT01_CITY"
    ,CM."KNA1_NAME1"
    ,LEFT(VR."ERDAT_SalesOrderCreationDate",4)
ORDER BY
    CM."KNA1_NAME1"
    ,LEFT(VR."ERDAT_SalesOrderCreationDate",4)


-- CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW "CHEM_DEV_SELFSERVE"."DIGITAL_MARKETING"."SALES_REVENUE_CUSTOMERS_final" AS (
-- SELECT
--     "CHEM_DEVELOPMENT"."CURATED"."SALES_VOLUME_REPORT_VW"."KUNNR_SOLDTO-NO" as "Customer"

--     ,"CHEM_DEVELOPMENT"."CURATED"."VWCUSTOMER_MASTER"."KNA1_NAME1" as "Company Name"
--     ,LEFT("CHEM_DEVELOPMENT"."CURATED"."SALES_VOLUME_REPORT_VW"."ERDAT_SalesOrderCreationDate",4) as "Year of sale"
--     ,ROUND(SUM("CHEM_DEVELOPMENT"."CURATED"."SALES_VOLUME_REPORT_VW"."NETVALUE_USD")) as "Total Sales"
-- FROM "CHEM_DEVELOPMENT"."CURATED"."SALES_VOLUME_REPORT_VW"
-- JOIN "CHEM_DEVELOPMENT"."CURATED"."VWCUSTOMER_MASTER" on "CHEM_DEVELOPMENT"."CURATED"."VWCUSTOMER_MASTER"."KNA1_KUNNR_CUSTOMERNUMBER" = "CHEM_DEVELOPMENT"."CURATED"."SALES_VOLUME_REPORT_VW"."KUNNR_SOLDTO-NO"
-- GROUP BY
--     "CHEM_DEVELOPMENT"."CURATED"."SALES_VOLUME_REPORT_VW"."KUNNR_SOLDTO-NO"
--     ,"CHEM_DEVELOPMENT"."CURATED"."VWCUSTOMER_MASTER"."KNA1_LAND1_COUNTRYKEY"
--     ,"CHEM_DEVELOPMENT"."CURATED"."VWCUSTOMER_MASTER"."KNA1_ORT01_CITY"
--     ,"CHEM_DEVELOPMENT"."CURATED"."VWCUSTOMER_MASTER"."KNA1_NAME1"
--     ,LEFT("CHEM_DEVELOPMENT"."CURATED"."SALES_VOLUME_REPORT_VW"."ERDAT_SalesOrderCreationDate",4)
-- ORDER BY
--     "CHEM_DEVELOPMENT"."CURATED"."VWCUSTOMER_MASTER"."KNA1_NAME1"
--     ,LEFT("CHEM_DEVELOPMENT"."CURATED"."SALES_VOLUME_REPORT_VW"."ERDAT_SalesOrderCreationDate",4));

macro.dbt_snowflake.snowflake__get_catal.raw_sql:
{% macro snowflake__get_catalog(information_schemas) -%}

    {%- call statement('catalog', fetch_result=True) -%}
    {% for information_schema in information_schemas %}

        (
            with tables as (

                select
                    table_catalog as "table_database",
                    table_schema as "table_schema",
                    table_name as "table_name",
                    table_type as "table_type",

                    -- note: this is the _role_ that owns the table
                    table_owner as "table_owner",

                    'Clustering Key' as "stats:clustering_key:label",
                    clustering_key as "stats:clustering_key:value",
                    'The key used to cluster this table' as "stats:clustering_key:description",
                    (clustering_key is not null) as "stats:clustering_key:include",

                    'Row Count' as "stats:row_count:label",
                    row_count as "stats:row_count:value",
                    'An approximate count of rows in this table' as "stats:row_count:description",
                    (row_count is not null) as "stats:row_count:include",

                    'Approximate Size' as "stats:bytes:label",
                    bytes as "stats:bytes:value",
                    'Approximate size of the table as reported by Snowflake' as "stats:bytes:description",
                    (bytes is not null) as "stats:bytes:include"

                from {{ information_schema }}.tables

            ),

            columns as (

                select
                    table_catalog as "table_database",
                    table_schema as "table_schema",
                    table_name as "table_name",
                    null as "table_comment",

                    column_name as "column_name",
                    ordinal_position as "column_index",
                    data_type as "column_type",
                    null as "column_comment"

                from {{ information_schema }}.columns

            )

            select *
            from tables
            join columns using ("table_database", "table_schema", "table_name")
            where "table_schema" != 'INFORMATION_SCHEMA'
            order by "column_index"
        )
        {% if not loop.last %} union all {% endif %}

    {% endfor %}
  {%- endcall -%}

  {{ return(load_result('catalog').table) }}

{%- endmacro %}

dbt.__overview__.file_contents:
{% docs __overview__ %}

### Welcome!

Welcome to the auto-generated documentation for your dbt project!

### Navigation

You can use the `Project` and `Database` navigation tabs on the left side of the window to explore the models
in your project.

#### Project Tab
The `Project` tab mirrors the directory structure of your dbt project. In this tab, you can see all of the
models defined in your dbt project, as well as models imported from dbt packages.

#### Database Tab
The `Database` tab also exposes your models, but in a format that looks more like a database explorer. This view
shows relations (tables and views) grouped into database schemas. Note that ephemeral models are _not_ shown
in this interface, as they do not exist in the database.

### Graph Exploration
You can click the blue icon on the bottom-right corner of the page to view the lineage graph of your models.

On model pages, you'll see the immediate parents and children of the model you're exploring. By clicking the `Expand`
button at the top-right of this lineage pane, you'll be able to see all of the models that are used to build,
or are built from, the model you're exploring.

Once expanded, you'll be able to use the `--models` and `--exclude` model selection syntax to filter the
models in the graph. For more information on model selection, check out the [dbt docs](https://docs.getdbt.com/docs/model-selection-syntax).

Note that you can also right-click on models to interactively filter and explore the graph.

---

### More information

- [What is dbt](https://docs.getdbt.com/docs/overview)?
- Read the [dbt viewpoint](https://docs.getdbt.com/docs/viewpoint)
- [Installation](https://docs.getdbt.com/docs/installation)
- Join the [chat](https://slack.getdbt.com/) on Slack for live questions and support.

{% enddocs %}
dbt.__overview__.name: __overview__
dbt.__overview__.block_contents:
### Welcome!

Welcome to the auto-generated documentation for your dbt project!

### Navigation

You can use the `Project` and `Database` navigation tabs on the left side of the window to explore the models
in your project.

#### Project Tab
The `Project` tab mirrors the directory structure of your dbt project. In this tab, you can see all of the
models defined in your dbt project, as well as models imported from dbt packages.

#### Database Tab
The `Database` tab also exposes your models, but in a format that looks more like a database explorer. This view
shows relations (tables and views) grouped into database schemas. Note that ephemeral models are _not_ shown
in this interface, as they do not exist in the database.

### Graph Exploration
You can click the blue icon on the bottom-right corner of the page to view the lineage graph of your models.

On model pages, you'll see the immediate parents and children of the model you're exploring. By clicking the `Expand`
button at the top-right of this lineage pane, you'll be able to see all of the models that are used to build,
or are built from, the model you're exploring.

Once expanded, you'll be able to use the `--models` and `--exclude` model selection syntax to filter the
models in the graph. For more information on model selection, check out the [dbt docs](https://docs.getdbt.com/docs/model-selection-syntax).

Note that you can also right-click on models to interactively filter and explore the graph.

---

### More information

- [What is dbt](https://docs.getdbt.com/docs/overview)?
- Read the [dbt viewpoint](https://docs.getdbt.com/docs/viewpoint)
